lines.text: Okay look, if I'm wrong, then you're the Post's new cover boy. But what if I'm right?

[as she searches for him]
Salim... Salim... SALIM... SALIM!

[off-camera as Ronnie searches for him]
Until we meet again... my dear!
Maybe but i have the gun
I have two bullets left; one is for you... the other is for him... now who goes first?
